articles.name: Here are the differences between squid and flying squid: characteristics, properties and use in cooking
articles.content_text: Squid and flying squid Squid and flying squid are both cephalopod mollusks and have some similarities, but there are also some differences between them. Squid is generally larger than flying squid and can reach significant sizes, even up to a meter in length. Flying squid is usually smaller, with an average length of about 15-20 cm. Another difference between the two is the body shape. Squid has an elongated and cylindrical body, while flying squid has a shorter and rounder body. Furthermore, the suckers on squid tentacles are equipped with small teeth that help it grip its prey, while those of flying squid are smooth. Finally, the taste of the two mollusks can be slightly different: flying squid has a more delicate and sweet taste, while squid has a more intense and decisive taste. In the kitchen, the two mollusks can be used in similar ways, but sometimes they are preferred in different dishes depending on regional culinary preferences. In general, squid is considered more valuable than flying squid, especially for its intense flavor and soft texture. Squid is often used in cooking for preparing high-end dishes, such as the famous "squid risotto". However, the quality and value of the two mollusks also depend on the variety and fishing areas. For example, high-quality flying squid caught in certain areas can be just as valuable as squid. In any case, both mollusks are a valuable source of nutrients. Why squid is preferred Squid is often preferred over flying squid for some characteristics that make it particularly appreciated in cooking. First of all, squid has softer and more delicate meat than flying squid, which makes it more versatile in cooking and easy to prepare. Furthermore, squid has an intense and characteristic flavor, which makes it ideal for preparing tasty dishes. Furthermore, squid is often used for preparing traditional dishes in many cultures, such as Mediterranean, Asian, and South American cuisine, which increases its popularity. Finally, squid is a source of high-quality proteins, low in fat and rich in minerals such as iron, selenium and zinc. This makes it a nutritious and healthy food, which is also appreciated by those who follow a balanced diet. order now Squid P2 20% discount on your order. Your offer
articles.content_html:
Squid and flying squid

Squid and flying squid are both cephalopod mollusks and have some similarities, but there are also some differences between them.

Squid is generally larger than flying squid and can reach significant sizes, even up to a meter in length. Flying squid is usually smaller, with an average length of about 15-20 cm.

Another difference between the two is the body shape. Squid has an elongated and cylindrical body, while flying squid has a shorter and rounder body.

Furthermore, the suckers on squid tentacles are equipped with small teeth that help it grip its prey, while those of flying squid are smooth.

Finally, the taste of the two mollusks can be slightly different: flying squid has a more delicate and sweet taste, while squid has a more intense and decisive taste.

In the kitchen, the two mollusks can be used in similar ways, but sometimes they are preferred in different dishes depending on regional culinary preferences.

In general, squid is considered more valuable than flying squid, especially for its intense flavor and soft texture. Squid is often used in cooking for preparing high-end dishes, such as the famous "squid risotto".

However, the quality and value of the two mollusks also depend on the variety and fishing areas. For example, high-quality flying squid caught in certain areas can be just as valuable as squid. In any case, both mollusks are a valuable source of nutrients.

Why squid is preferred

     Squid is often preferred over flying squid for some characteristics that make it particularly appreciated in cooking.

First of all, squid has softer and more delicate meat than flying squid, which makes it more versatile in cooking and easy to prepare. Furthermore, squid has an intense and characteristic flavor, which makes it ideal for preparing tasty dishes.

Furthermore, squid is often used for preparing traditional dishes in many cultures, such as Mediterranean, Asian, and South American cuisine, which increases its popularity.

Finally, squid is a source of high-quality proteins, low in fat and rich in minerals such as iron, selenium and zinc. This makes it a nutritious and healthy food, which is also appreciated by those who follow a balanced diet.

articles.name: 7 steps to select the right staff for your restaurant
articles.subtitle: l'azienda la fanno i dipendenti giusti
articles.content_text: Dear entrepreneur, manager........ We are aware that finding the right staff for your restaurant can be a challenge. However, we want to emphasize the importance of staff selection for the success of your business. The restaurant staff is the face of the company and represents the culinary experience you offer. Good staff selection can make the difference between a satisfied customer and an unsatisfied customer. Furthermore, employees are the heart of the organization and contribute to creating a positive work atmosphere. Furthermore, another important aspect to consider for having more relaxed and less stressed employees is the choice of a reliable and complete food supplier, who can guarantee daily deliveries and a wide range of products. To ensure the success of your restaurant, we recommend investing time in selecting the right staff. Look for people with experience and passion for the food sector, with a positive attitude and customer service orientation. Furthermore, it is important to evaluate the skills and qualities of candidates. Remember that good staff selection not only improves the customer experience, but also increases employee productivity and satisfaction. Investing in staff selection can make the difference between success and failure of your restaurant. 7 steps Analyze the required profile for the open position: Before starting the staff selection process, it is important to understand exactly what professional profile you are looking for. For example, if you are looking for a cook, evaluate the skills and experience required for that position.Post the job offer: Post the job offer on job listing websites or social media, specifying the required skills, tasks and responsibilities of the role, required experience level, and working hours. Remember to also specify the personal qualities you are looking for.Analyze CVs and applications: After receiving the applications, analyze the CVs and cover letters to select the most suitable candidates. Carefully evaluate their work experiences and skills, making sure they are in line with the position requirements.Conduct an interview: Schedule an appointment for an interview with the candidates who passed the selection phase. The interview will allow you to deepen the skills and experiences of the candidates, but also to evaluate their personal qualities. Try to ask open questions and create a relaxed atmosphere.Do a practical test: To evaluate the skills of candidates, you can organize a practical test. For example, for a cook, you could ask them to prepare a dish or a complete menu. This way, you can evaluate their technical ability and their ability to manage time and stress.Check references: Before hiring a new employee, always check their references, i.e. their previous employers. This will allow you to verify the accuracy of the information provided by the candidate and better understand their qualities and potential.Choose the right candidate: At the end of the selection process, choose the candidate who best meets your needs and who has demonstrated having the skills and personal qualities needed for the position. Make a job offer and define the contractual conditions.Remember that staff selection is a fundamental process for the success of your restaurant, so take the time necessary to carefully evaluate each application and choose the right candidate for the position. importantCertainly, staff selection is fundamental for the success of your restaurant. And we, as a food supplier, want to emphasize the importance of providing a flexible and reliable service to help reduce the pressure and responsibility on your staff. The secret to the success of your restaurant Without a complete, reliable and flexible food supply service, your restaurant could have difficulty maintaining the quality and variety of products offered to customers. This could cause stress and pressure on your staff, who would have to manage the search for suppliers.Without a reliable and flexible food supplier, you might also be forced to make compromise choices, such as purchasing lower quality or limited products, which could negatively affect the quality of your menu. Furthermore, you would have to commit valuable resources, such as time and staff, to searching for suppliers.In summary, a reliable and flexible food supply service is fundamental for the success of your restaurant, as it can help you reduce the pressure and responsibility on your staff, guarantee the quality of products offered to your customers and allow you to focus on the core business.
articles.content_html:
Dear entrepreneur, manager........

We are aware that finding the right staff for your restaurant can be a challenge. However, we want to emphasize the importance of staff selection for the success of your business.

The restaurant staff is the face of the company and represents the culinary experience you offer. Good staff selection can make the difference between a satisfied customer and an unsatisfied customer. Furthermore, employees are the heart of the organization and contribute to creating a positive work atmosphere.

Furthermore, another important aspect to consider for having more relaxed and less stressed employees is the choice of a reliable and complete food supplier, who can guarantee daily deliveries and a wide range of products.

To ensure the success of your restaurant, we recommend investing time in selecting the right staff. Look for people with experience and passion for the food sector, with a positive attitude and customer service orientation. Furthermore, it is important to evaluate the skills and qualities of candidates.

Remember that good staff selection not only improves the customer experience, but also increases employee productivity and satisfaction. Investing in staff selection can make the difference between success and failure of your restaurant.

7 steps 

  1. Analyze the required profile for the open position: Before starting the staff selection process, it is important to understand exactly what professional profile you are looking for. For example, if you are looking for a cook, evaluate the skills and experience required for that position.

  2. Post the job offer: Post the job offer on job listing websites or social media, specifying the required skills, tasks and responsibilities of the role, required experience level, and working hours. Remember to also specify the personal qualities you are looking for.

  3. Analyze CVs and applications: After receiving the applications, analyze the CVs and cover letters to select the most suitable candidates. Carefully evaluate their work experiences and skills, making sure they are in line with the position requirements.

  4. Conduct an interview: Schedule an appointment for an interview with the candidates who passed the selection phase. The interview will allow you to deepen the skills and experiences of the candidates, but also to evaluate their personal qualities. Try to ask open questions and create a relaxed atmosphere.

  5. Do a practical test: To evaluate the skills of candidates, you can organize a practical test. For example, for a cook, you could ask them to prepare a dish or a complete menu. This way, you can evaluate their technical ability and their ability to manage time and stress.

  6. Check references: Before hiring a new employee, always check their references, i.e. their previous employers. This will allow you to verify the accuracy of the information provided by the candidate and better understand their qualities and potential.

  7. Choose the right candidate: At the end of the selection process, choose the candidate who best meets your needs and who has demonstrated having the skills and personal qualities needed for the position. Make a job offer and define the contractual conditions.

Remember that staff selection is a fundamental process for the success of your restaurant, so take the time necessary to carefully evaluate each application and choose the right candidate for the position.

important
Certainly, staff selection is fundamental for the success of your restaurant. And we, as a food supplier, want to emphasize the importance of providing a flexible and reliable service to help reduce the pressure and responsibility on your staff.

The secret to the success of your restaurant

Without a complete, reliable and flexible food supply service, your restaurant could have difficulty maintaining the quality and variety of products offered to customers. This could cause stress and pressure on your staff, who would have to manage the search for suppliers.

Without a reliable and flexible food supplier, you might also be forced to make compromise choices, such as purchasing lower quality or limited products, which could negatively affect the quality of your menu. Furthermore, you would have to commit valuable resources, such as time and staff, to searching for suppliers.

In summary, a reliable and flexible food supply service is fundamental for the success of your restaurant, as it can help you reduce the pressure and responsibility on your staff, guarantee the quality of products offered to your customers and allow you to focus on the core business.

articles.name: March 24th is Artisan Gelato Day
articles.subtitle: Artisan
articles.content_text: Yes, artisan gelato is always a good choice, even in March! March 24th is Artisan Gelato Day, an occasion to celebrate the art of artisan gelato production, the quality of ingredients used, and the creativity of gelato makers. On this day, many artisan gelaterias offer special promotions and new gelato flavors, so it's a great opportunity to taste something new and delight in a cold and tasty treat. Furthermore, March also marks the beginning of spring, a season when gelato becomes even more pleasant and refreshing to enjoy under the spring sun. We're here to celebrate Artisan Gelato Day, a celebration that honors our commitment to preparing high-quality gelato with natural ingredients and artisanal care.Artisan gelato is different from industrial ice cream because it uses high-quality ingredients and is produced in small quantities. This way, we can guarantee an authentic taste and uncompromising quality in every cup of gelato we serve.March is the perfect time to appreciate artisan gelato - March 24th is Artisan Gelato Day We're proud to offer not only our artisan gelato, but also the ingredients to make it. Call and you'll find all the high-quality ingredients needed to prepare your artisan gelato for your restaurant.For our restaurant clients, we offer high-quality ingredients in large quantities. We have a wide range of flavors to choose from, including vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, pistachio, lemon, and many more. Our ingredients have been selected to guarantee an authentic flavor and creamy consistency, all at competitive prices.
articles.content_html:
Yes, artisan gelato is always a good choice, even in March! March 24th is Artisan Gelato Day, an occasion to celebrate the art of artisan gelato production, the quality of ingredients used, and the creativity of gelato makers. On this day, many artisan gelaterias offer special promotions and new gelato flavors, so it's a great opportunity to taste something new and delight in a cold and tasty treat. Furthermore, March also marks the beginning of spring, a season when gelato becomes even more pleasant and refreshing to enjoy under the spring sun.

We're here to celebrate Artisan Gelato Day, a celebration that honors our commitment to preparing high-quality gelato with natural ingredients and artisanal care.

Artisan gelato is different from industrial ice cream because it uses high-quality ingredients and is produced in small quantities. This way, we can guarantee an authentic taste and uncompromising quality in every cup of gelato we serve.

March is the perfect time to appreciate artisan gelato - March 24th is Artisan Gelato Day

We're proud to offer not only our artisan gelato, but also the ingredients to make it. Call and you'll find all the high-quality ingredients needed to prepare your artisan gelato for your restaurant.

For our restaurant clients, we offer high-quality ingredients in large quantities. We have a wide range of flavors to choose from, including vanilla, chocolate, strawberry, pistachio, lemon, and many more. Our ingredients have been selected to guarantee an authentic flavor and creamy consistency, all at competitive prices.

products.name: PROSCIUTTO CRUDO DI SAN DANIELE DISOSSATO ADDOBBO LAVATO S.V. KG 7.5 MV
products.description_text: Indulge in the exquisite taste of our 'Prosciutto di San Daniele Disossato Addobbo Lavato S.V. KG 7.5 MV'. This premium, bone-in prosciutto is expertly crafted in the picturesque region of San Daniele, Italy, renowned for its rich traditions and artisan techniques. Each 7.5 kg piece is skillfully hand-selected and meticulously cured, resulting in a delicate balance of savory and sweet flavors that melt in your mouth. Our prosciutto is prepared without the bone, offering ease of slicing and serving, while the washed finishing (Addobbo Lavato) emphasizes its natural beauty and enhances the overall tasting experience. Perfect for charcuterie boards, gourmet sandwiches, or as a delightful addition to pasta dishes, this prosciutto is a true testament to Italian heritage and culinary excellence. Elevate your dining experience with this luxurious delicacy that captures the essence of Italy in every bite.

This exquisite aged cheese comes in a generous 14 kg wheel, perfect for cutting and serving at fine dining establishments, catering events, or as a focal point in your cheese display. ASIAGO DOP Vecchio is more than just a cheese; it's a taste of tradition and quality. Elevate your menu with this premium offering from Fiordimaso, and let your customers savor the authentic flavors of Italy. Il processo di produzione segue una delle normative più restrittive al mondo e include, oltre all'utilizzo di ingredienti esclusivamente locali, una quadrupla distillazione senza aggiunta di additivi o aromi di alcun tipo.

products.name: BUCATINI 2.7MM GRAGNANO IGP 24X500G CRT DI MART
products.description_text: Introducing **Bucatini 2.7mm Gragnano IGP** – a true Italian treasure! Each 500g pack, thoughtfully housed in a convenient 24-unit carton by Di Mart, offers you the authentic taste of Gragnano, a town renowned for its pasta craftsmanship. This artisanal bucatini, measuring 2.7 mm in diameter, features a delightful hollow center that perfectly captures rich sauces, making each bite a burst of flavor. Crafted from high-quality durum wheat semolina and water, this pasta is the epitome of tradition and quality, proudly bearing the PGI (Protected Geographical Indication) seal. Whether tossed in a classic amatriciana, decadently creamy sauce, or a simple garlic and olive oil blend, our Bucatini will elevate every meal to a culinary masterpiece. Discover the heart of Italy in your kitchen and indulge in the exquisite texture and exceptional taste that only Gragnano pasta can provide!

products.description_text: COLORE ALIMENTARE SPRAY PERLATO ORO SOLCHIM PZ FERR Rendi le tue creazioni culinarie un'esperienza straordinaria con il **Colore Alimentare Spray Perlato Oro Solchim**! Questo prodotto di alta qualità è perfetto per chi desidera aggiungere un tocco di eleganza e raffinatezza a dolci, dessert e piatti salati. La sua formula innovativa assicura una stesura uniforme e uniforme, creando un effetto perlato che cattura la luce in modo sublime, donando alle tue preparazioni un aspetto regale e irresistibile. Ideale per decorare torte, biscotti, cioccolatini e persino piatti salati, questo spray è un alleato prezioso per chef e pasticceri alla ricerca di un tocco di glamour. **Caratteristiche Principali:** - **Colore:** Oro perlato, per un effetto chic e sofisticato. - **Applicazione:** Spray pratico e facile da usare, per una copertura omogenea. - **Versatilità:** Adatto per dolci, dessert e preparazioni salate. - **Sicurezza:** Prodotto alimentare conforme alle normative vigenti, sicuro per il consumo umano. Sia che tu stia preparando una torta per una festa speciale o desideri semplicemente dare un tocco di classe ai tuoi piatti quotidiani, il **Colore Alimentare Spray Perlato Oro Solchim** è l'accessorio indispensabile per ogni amante della cucina e della pasticceria. Sperimenta la magia del colore e trasforma ogni piatto in una piccola opera d'arte! Istruzioni per l'Uso Agitare bene prima dell'uso. Spruzzare da una distanza di circa 15-20 cm per un'applicazione uniforme e controllata. Lascia asciugare prima di servire per ottenere il massimo effetto visivo. **Non perdere l'occasione di brillare in cucina!** Aggiungi il **Colore Alimentare Spray Perlato Oro Solchim PZ FERR** al tuo kit di decorazioni e sorprendi i tuoi ospiti con capolavori che incantano gli occhi e il palato.

products.description_text: Introducing our exquisite **COPPA STAGIONATA SV INTERA KG 1.8 SORR**, a true delight for charcuterie enthusiasts. This whole, dry-cured meat is crafted from the finest cuts of pork, seasoned with a blend of aromatic spices and aged to perfection. With a tender texture and a beautifully marbled appearance, this coppa offers a perfect balance of sweetness and spice, making it an ideal addition to your antipasto platter or a flavorful ingredient in gourmet sandwiches. Elevate your culinary creations or enjoy it simply with crusty bread and a glass of red wine. Experience the essence of Italian tradition in every slice!
